name: 6 Can Chili
author: Rachel Roushar Claussen
summary: Super delicious, super easy. The baked beans are what makes this chili perfect!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can hot chili beans, undrained
directions: Heat the vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook the turkey meat until it's no longer pink, breaking the meat up as it cooks, 10 to 15 minutes
Pour the tomatoes into the skillet, and crush them into chunks with a spoon
Transfer the turkey meat and tomatoes into a soup pot
Stir in the hot chili beans, pinto beans, kidney beans, baked beans, and tomato paste
Bring the soup to a boil; simmer at least 10 minutes
Serve in bowls garnished with about 2 teaspoons of shredded Cheddar cheese and a dollop of sour cream
